name: Spot me if you can! [W.I.P]
description:
THIS IS WINDOWS ONLY. This is a work in progress, things are bound to change sooner or later.

Hi there! Im Krix, a person who has always wanted to make their own game.

I started from the 2nd or 3rd of May, I restarted a project and now im making this.

Its hard but i like making games, Anyways, this is my game!

(Currently has 3 levels, will add more)
